about.description-bottom: I am a student in computer science following the French training "BUT Informatique" and I am also a self-taught.

paragraphs.title: Developer Full Stack
paragraphs.description:
Computer programming is my main hobby, I love it!
Mostly web development for the moment but I'm programming in others programming language too.

paragraphs.title: Open-Source enthusiast
paragraphs.description:
For me, everyone should work, solve problems, build things and think together.
The website is open-source on GitHub.

paragraphs.title: Passionate about High-Tech
paragraphs.description: I always wondered how the future would be. Every day I want to wake up and think that the future will be great and better than the past. Technologies improve gradually over time, which is very useful in many areas.

items.title: Carolo
items.description: Strategy board game similar to chess which allows grandiose moves (only available in French).

items.title: Leon
items.description: Leon is your open-source personal assistant.

open-source.description: List of most famous open source projects I contributed to.
